metadata.title: CVE-2019-20387 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
repodata_schema2id in repodata.c in libsolv before 0.7.6 has a heap-basedbuffer over-read via a last schema whose length is less than the length ofthe input schema.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsolv-perl - 0.6.36-2
libsolv-tools - 0.6.36-2
libsolv1 - 0.6.36-2
libsolvext1 - 0.6.36-2
python3-solv - 0.6.36-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsolv package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.36-2').
